pull_requests.title: BIPs 18 and 52: remove broken links
pull_requests.body:
BIP 18: remove the outdated reference link to Gavin Andresen's pay_to_script_hash branch in the Bitcoin repository https://github.com/gavinandresen/bitcoin-git/tree/pay_to_script_hash

BIP 52: remove https://www.powx.org/opow - no alternative link found in google

pull_requests.title: BIP2: license section fixups
pull_requests.body:
- Update MIT license name per https://opensource.org/license/MIT and https://spdx.org/licenses/MIT
- Fix up license URLs with 301 redirects

pull_requests.title: BIP3: license section updates
pull_requests.body:
Picks up #1931 and adds a commit to update the MIT license name. Changes:

- Fix up license URLs with 301 redirects
- Add MIT-0 License
- Update MIT license name per https://opensource.org/license/MIT and https://spdx.org/licenses/MIT
